title: Holiday WeWow Day 2: Do You Want to Build A Frozen Ice Crystal Humanoid?
description:
In Day 2 of Holiday WeWow, Mindy and Guy Raz are building.... frozen ice crystal humanoids!! Don't have any winter weather? No problem! Make your own snowbeing with shaving cream, ice cubes, or anything you'd like! Head tinkercast.com for more!
